messages.message: @Nithin how did we support the Arabic DL app?

In build, we can get an API endpoint which supports these languages after publishing an app with Non-Latin Advanced features (Digitization). That's how the Arabic DL app is created.

But in converse, every API call is a new converse and we can't set these digitisation settings through the API. 

EPD-4383 is created to provide a feature where converse supports all the languages through API call.
